subject: When comet?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Must be on a roll, they answer two questions. I believe they answer
2012(twenty twelve)-or is it "watch the earth--"?. but it's muffled. I asked
twice, and at the end "it hits the earth"

F-S

Mus be on a oll, hey answe wo ques ions. I belie e hey answe 2012( wen y wel e)-o is i  "wa ch he ea h--"?. bu i 's mu led. I asked wice, and a he end "i hi s he ea h"
 
F-S
